# ParameterOption

**Structure**

A type that represents the various customizations that you can make to a tip parameter.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ParameterOption
```

## Type Properties

- **ParameterOption.transient**: An option that resets the parameter value the first time it is referenced.

## Related Documentation

- **Parameter**: A type that monitors the state of its wrapped value to reevaluate any dependent tip rules when the value changes.

## Parameters

- **Parameter**: A type that monitors the state of its wrapped value to reevaluate any dependent tip rules when the value changes.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
